data.title: Compare Cost of Living in Ellis County, TX
meta_keywords: cheapest places to live in Ellis County
data.meta_description: Ranking of cost of living based on consumer price index and affordable housing. Explore the cheapest places to live in Ellis County.
data.text:

Suburb of Dallas, TX ,

3 Niche users give it an average review of 4.3 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says I like the extended creeks that roam behind the houses and the calming chirps of birds and owls and hawks flying above. I enjoy the ease of long walks up and down the street. It's a very peaceful... .
